docs.title: POST /api/collection/query
docs.text:
Query collections

Input parameters

Parameter In Type Default Nullable Description oauth2 header string N/A No

Request body

application/json 

{
    "ids": [
        "a535a285-4cb0-48c2-8939-368cb26388b1"
    ],
    "excludedIds": [
        "bdc68446-b761-4499-87e8-1ce63de84a4e"
    ],
    "datasetIds": [
        "7be87400-acc1-44e5-ba02-4495dd460258"
    ],
    "like": "string",
    "page": {
        "offset": 0,
        "size": 10
    },
    "order": {
        "items": [
            "+name",
            "-id"
        ]
    },
    "metadata": {
        "countAll": true
    },
    "project": {
        "fields": [
            "id",
            "name",
            "foo.id",
            "foo.bar.id"
        ]
    }
}

        "ids": {
